Item.name: Fabricator
Item.description: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of parts and basic items from raw materials.

Item.name: Assembler
Item.description: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of items out of parts and basic materials.

Item.name: Tool Kit
Item.description: A kit containing the necessary tools to repair items or manufacture makeshift equipment in case of emergency.

Item.name: Research Terminal
Item.description: A machine used to easily design and print various blueprints.

Item.name: Card Maker
Item.description: A machine capable of manufacturing access cards from raw materials.

Item.name: Sewing Kit
Item.description: Basic tools for clothing repair or modification.

Item.name: Chemical Fabricator
Item.description: A machine that can be used to manufacture various medical devices and chemicals.

Item.name: Electrical Oven
Item.description: An oven useful enough to cook a number of delicious food.

Item.name: Deconstructor
Item.description: Disassembles and breaks down items to reusable components and material bars.
